content.rendered:
Accessibility Statement

Underdog Kennels is committed to ensuring accessibility for all visitors to our website. We strive to provide an accessible experience for everyone, regardless of any disabilities they may have.

Compliance with WCAG Standards

We adhere to the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) to ensure that our website is accessible to people with disabilities. These guidelines outline best practices for making web content more accessible to all users, including those with visual, auditory, motor, and cognitive disabilities.

Accessibility Features

We have implemented various accessibility features on our website to enhance user experience, including but not limited to:

  • Alternative text for images
  • Keyboard navigation support
  • Clear and consistent navigation

Feedback

We are continually improving the user experience for everyone and welcome feedback on the accessibility of our website. If you encounter any accessibility barriers or have suggestions for improvement, please contact us at [contact information].

Further Assistance

If you require assistance or have any questions about the accessibility of our website, please do not hesitate to contact us.
